mellasonic.nipped.game.point_and_click.interactives

Class Invisible

  • java.lang.Object
    • mellasonic.nipped.game.point_and_click.interactives.Invisible
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Interactive

    public abstract class Invisible
extends java.lang.Object
implements Interactive
    an invisible collider that is meant to symbolize an object in the background. It contains a yellow tint and outline, and potentially a star for when it hasn't been clicked yet
